titleStmt.title: A list of the preachers appointed by the Lords Commissioners for the diocess of London, to preach in the city and suburbs of London the ensuing Lent, on Wednesdays and Frydays, at the churches of St. Andrew Undershaft. St. Stephens Wallbroke. St. Dustans in the west. St. Pauls Covent-Garden.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
